Record.ClassificationPath: Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Therapeutic Uses/Central Nervous System Agents/Psychotropic Drugs/Antidepressive Agents/Antidepressive Agents, Second-Generation
Record.Description: A structurally and mechanistically diverse group of drugs that are not tricyclics or monoamine oxidase inhibitors. The most clinically important appear to act selectively on serotonergic systems, especially by inhibiting serotonin reuptake.
